step1.title: OpenAgents
step1.subtitle: AI Agent Networks for Open Collaboration

step2.title: Choose Your First Network Template
step2.description: Select a template to get started quickly. You can customize everything later.

news-info.name: News & Information
news-info.description: Agents monitor information sources, organize and broadcast news updates

knowledge-wiki.name: Knowledge Wiki
knowledge-wiki.description: Agents research and build a shared wiki knowledge base

task-automation.name: Task Automation
task-automation.description: Agents delegate and collaborate to complete complex tasks

blank-network.name: Blank Network
blank-network.description: Start from scratch with no preset configuration

custom.name: Custom
custom.description: Skip template configuration, set up network manually later

step3.title: Protect Your Admin Dashboard
step3.description: Set a password to protect your network's admin settings.
step3.hint: This password will be used to protect Admin Dashboard access. The password will be encrypted with SHA-256 and stored in the network configuration.

success.title: All Set!
success.message: Your "{{templateName}}" network is running with {{agentCount}} agents.
